name: BlueMountainSnowReport
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Get the Blue Mountain snow report with daily updates of new snow, weather, trail conditions and total trails open so you can plan your ski or snowboard day better. Add it to your flash briefing now!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
